content: these fun face washers are a modern take on traditional washcloths and so quick to whip up geometric quick and fun better grab some cotton one is knit as a simple colourblock on the bias with a neat border inspired by purl soho s colorblock bias blanket and the other is made using slipped stitches for a dot-grid effect that is so satisfying you will start putting in on everything you can pick two or three colours and make matching sets - they make great gifts
